verses.verse: In the second <WH8147> year <WH8141> of Darius <WH1867> the king <WH4428>, in the sixth <WH8345> month <WH2320>, in the first <WH259> day <WH3117> of the month <WH2320>, came the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> by <WH3027> Haggai <WH2292> the prophet <WH5030> unto Zerubbabel <WH2216> the son <WH1121> of Shealtiel <WH7597>, governor <WH6346> of Judah <WH3063>, and to Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Josedech <WH3087>, the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548>, saying <WH559>,

Thus speaks <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, saying <WH559>, This people <WH5971> say <WH559>, The time <WH6256> is not come <WH935>, the time <WH6256> that the Lord <WH3068>'s house <WH1004> should be built <WH1129>.
Then came the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> by <WH3027> Haggai <WH2292> the prophet <WH5030>, saying <WH559>,
Is it time <WH6256> for you <WH3427>, O you, to live in your paneled <WH5603> houses <WH1004>, and this house <WH1004> lie waste <WH2720>?
Now therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>; Consider <WH7760> your ways <WH1870>.

You have sown <WH2232> much <WH7235>, and bring <WH935> in little <WH4592>; you eat <WH398>, but you have not enough <WH7654>; you drink <WH8354>, but you are not filled with drink <WH7937>; you clothe <WH3847> yourself <WH2527>, but there is no one warm; and he that earns wages <WH7936> earns wages <WH7936> to put it into a bag <WH6872> with holes <WH5344>.
Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>; Consider <WH7760> your ways <WH1870>.

Go up <WH5927> to the mountain <WH2022>, and bring <WH935> wood <WH6086>, and build <WH1129> the house <WH1004>; and I will take pleasure <WH7521> in it <WH3513>, and I will be glorified, says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>.

You looked <WH6437> for much <WH7235>, and <WH4592>, behold, it came to little; and when you brought <WH935> it home <WH1004>, I did blow <WH5301> upon it <WH5002>. Why? says the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>. Because <WH3282> of my house <WH1004> that is waste <WH2720>, and you run <WH7323> every man <WH376> unto his own house <WH1004>.
Therefore the heaven <WH8064> over you is stayed <WH3607> from dew <WH2919>, and the earth <WH776> is stayed <WH3607> from her fruit <WH2981>.

And I called <WH7121> for a drought <WH2721> upon the land <WH776>, and upon the mountains <WH2022>, and upon the corn <WH1715>, and upon the new wine <WH8492>, and upon the oil <WH3323>, and upon that which the ground <WH127> brings forth <WH3318>, and upon men <WH120>, and upon cattle <WH929>, and upon all the labor <WH3018> of the hands <WH3709>.

Then Zerubbabel <WH2216> the son <WH1121> of Shealtiel <WH7597>, and Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Josedech <WH3087>, the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548>, with all the remnant <WH7611> of the people <WH5971>, obeyed <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of the Lord <WH3068> their God <WH430>, and the words <WH1697> of Haggai <WH2292> the prophet <WH5030>, as the Lord <WH3068> their God <WH430> had sent <WH7971> him <WH5971>, and the people did fear <WH3372> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>.

Then spoke <WH559> Haggai <WH2292> the Lord <WH3068>'s messenger <WH4397> in the Lord <WH3068>'s message <WH4400> unto the people <WH5971>, saying <WH559>, I am with you <WH5002>, says the Lord <WH3068>.

And the Lord <WH3068> stirred up <WH5782> the spirit <WH7307> of Zerubbabel <WH2216> the son <WH1121> of Shealtiel <WH7597>, governor <WH6346> of Judah <WH3063>, and the spirit <WH7307> of Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Josedech <WH3087>, the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548>, and the spirit <WH7307> of all the remnant <WH7611> of the people <WH5971>; and they came <WH935> and did <WH6213> work <WH4399> in the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, their God <WH430>,
In the four <WH702> and twentieth <WH6242> day <WH3117> of the sixth <WH8345> month <WH2320>, in the second <WH8147> year <WH8141> of Darius <WH1867> the king <WH4428>.
